venue.address_2: T Green line, Boston University West
venue.name: Boston University Concert Hall

item.description:
The wonderful fairy tale for kids and adults in Russian!
855 Commonwealth avenue, Boston, MA
College of Fine Arts, Boston University Concert Hall.
Adults - $5, kids - free.
Before and after the show you will have the great opportunity to buy Russian books for children with discount.
Hope to see you there!
www.russianartcenter.org

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Show for kids "Gruffalo" in Russian!
